features.featureTitle: Update the Car Rentals page and all references to display the correct per-km pricing: Sedan at ₹13/km and SUV at ₹21/km. Update the fare estimator calculation logic to use these rates. Ensure the estimated fare displayed to the user and stored in the car rental inquiry submitted to the backend reflects these correct rates.

Add a new public Hotel & Hospitality Bookings page accessible from the main navigation and from the homepage. The page should describe Blackrays' hotel booking assistance service covering properties across India and internationally. Include a hotel search/inquiry form capturing: destination city/location, check-in date, check-out date, number of guests, number of rooms, and room type preference (Standard / Deluxe / Suite). Integrate a real-time hotel search API (e.g., RapidAPI Hotels or a compatible aggregator) to display live hotel results with property name, star rating, location, price per night, and a booking/contact CTA. Handle loading, empty, and error states gracefully. On form submission (for inquiry fallback), store the request as an inquiry in the backend with category 'hotel_booking'.

Update the homepage service cards/section to include a Hotel & Hospitality Bookings card with a brief description (e.g., 'Find and book premium hotels across India and internationally') and a CTA button linking to the '/hotels' page. Ensure the layout remains visually consistent with the existing premium black/white/grey aesthetic.

Add a 'Hotels' tab to the homepage hero search widget (HeroSearchWidget) alongside the existing Flights, Trains, Car Rentals, and Tour Packages tabs. The Hotels tab should show quick-search inputs for destination city, check-in date, and check-out date. Submitting the form should navigate to the '/hotels' page with pre-filled search parameters where applicable.
